item.title: Judge says Alina Habba, Trump's top federal prosecutor in New Jersey, not lawfully appointed
item.description: Alina Habba, who has served as the acting U.S. Attorney for New Jersey, is a former lawyer for President Donald Trump.

item.title: House Democrats probe Paramount-Skydance merger over Trump dealings
item.description: Reps. Jamie Raskin and Frank Pallone highlighted Paramount settling Trump's lawsuit against CBS over the editing of a "60 Minutes" interview with Kama...

item.title: Trump half-billion-dollar civil fraud fine overturned by New York appeals court
item.description: The fraud lawsuit against President Donald Trump and others, which led to the penalty, was filed by New York State Attorney General Letitia James.

item.title: Trump official says DOJ will investigate Fed Governor Cook
item.description: President Donald Trump has declared that Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook must resign over mortgage allegations lodged by FHFA Director Bill Pulte.

item.title: Elon Musk must face lawsuit claiming he ran illegal $1 million election lottery
item.description: Elon Musk was ordered on Wednesday by a federal judge to face a lawsuit accusing him of defrauding voters into signing a petition for a chance to win ...
